Html:
I'm currently evaluating Wolfpack and one of things that I like in OSS projects is being able to contribute/fix issues as easily as possible. E.g. I tried to install Wolfpack using latest Chocolatey and it's failing -- time to see if I can fix that.

However, CodePlex isn't that great for collaboration -- even MS teams moved most of their new projects to GitHub.

I think it would awesome if this project was on GitHub, as it would make contributions much easier.
